net.sf.ehcache.transaction.xa
Class EhcacheXAException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          javax.transaction.xa.XAException
              net.sf.ehcache.transaction.xa.EhcacheXAException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class EhcacheXAException
extends XAException

Small extension to the XAException defined in the JTA specification, to that the errorCode is provided when instantiating the Exception thrown

Author:
Alex Snaps
See Also:
Serialized Form
